title: Dancing Party, from a photography album with images of Japan
marks:
Inscription

LRC, in negative: [P 48 DNACING PAR
description: three young women wearing traditional Japanese costumes; standing woman at center wears light blue kimono with grey and pink flowers and has a red flower in her hair; standing woman flanked by two seated women; woman at left wears a purple kimono and blue, salmon and black plaid obi; woman at right wears patterned tan and grey kimono with blue lining and holds pink flowers
creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
